hadiths.text: Al-Shaibini reported to us:I asked Zirr b. Hubaish about the words of Allah (the Mighty and Great):" So he was (at a distance) of two bows or nearer" (al-Qur'an, Iiii 8). He said: Ibn Mas'ud informed me that, verily, the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) saw Gabriel and he had six hundred wings

chapter.eng-name: About (The Lote-Tree of the Utmost Boundary)
